1.0.6.name: wordpress/money-maker
1.0.6.description:
PalTip's Money Maker Plugin is the fastest and easiest way to monetize your product reviews and recommendations on your blog. We all know that affiliates can make you money, but the hassle can be a nightmare for bloggers. With the Money Maker plug-in, we do all the work for you. You just need to install and activate the plug-inand write your blog post as you would normally. The Money Maker plug-in will convert automatically your links to personalized affiliate links. We have partnered with over 2500 affiliate programs and are adding more every day. Start earning money from you blog today!

Download > install > activate > write post > publish > earn your share!

Money Maker by PalTip: Share your tip - Earn your share.

PalTip is the easiest way to earn money by recommending products
